content:
I am a Ph.D. student at University of Notre Dame advised by Professor Meng Jiang. Perviously, I received a Bachelor in Electrical & Computer Engineering at Sun Yat-sen University and a MEng in Electrical & Computer Engineering at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.
My research interest lies in deep models for scientific information extraction.
